issue.title: studio.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://studio.youtube.com/channel](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstudio.youtube.com%2Fchannel) ### Comment > Uploading speed is very slow when adguard is enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/8hpvn0u8p3wg0wg8swggsw08ggs8sowqwl1jpm155w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/pmw6geznny800ck84w8sko0os0coow0lwxoqbac700.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21.3 (5089) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | free AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.cloudflare.com/dns-query`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)`,
`List-KR for AdGuard (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/List-KR/List-KR@latest/filter-AdGuard.txt)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)`
`tinyShield (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js)`
`NamuLink (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/namulink@latest/dist/NamuLink.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://studio.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstudio.youtube.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.21.3+%285089%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.18.19.20.21.22&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29%252CList-KR%2520for%2520AdGuard%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fgh%252FList-KR%252FList-KR%2540latest%252Ffilter-AdGuard.txt%29&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.cloudflare.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%252C%250AtinyShield%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fnpm%252F%2540filteringdev%252Ftinyshield%2540latest%252Fdist%252FtinyShield.user.js%29%252C%250ANamuLink%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fnpm%252F%2540filteringdev%252Fnamulink%2540latest%252Fdist%252FNamuLink.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.15%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=true&stealth.disable_windows_defender=true&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fstudio.youtube.com%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=free&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true)
